name: Flower Hero
description:
We’ve combined the practiced perfection of rhythm games and sullied it with the random number generation hell of card games.

RULES:

  1. Click on cards that match flowers as they hit the red bar to kill the flower.
  2.  If you don't have the right card, play any other card, just don't lose the beat!
  3. Green cards are wild.

You get more points by getting multipliers, so use your wild cards carefully!

Our twitter junk:

Programming: @Expendibleman

2D art / animation: @MeghanRabbit
